Welcome to GVPT Maths Camp! Over the next five sessions, I will introduce you to important technical skills you will require to successfully complete your PhD.

## Pre-requisites

None! You will be introduced to these technical skills over this week. You will develop them throughout the PhD program (and through your own research outside of the program).
